Institute for Policy and Civic Engagement     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Institute for Policy and Civic Engagement      Institute for Policy and Civic Engagement   Google Translate        Main Menu    Research           Civic Engagement Research Awards         Democratic Education    Engagement           Discourse Awards         UPPF           UPPF Gallery of 2019-2020 Research Projects    Urban Public Policy Fellowship Application          Eyebrow menu    About    Staff    CUPPA    Make A Gift    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Institute for Policy and Civic Engagement       Institute for Policy and Civic Engagement  Empowering engagement and democratic learning.                    The Institute for Policy and Civic Engagement at UIC serves as a catalyst for learning and participatory action in discourse, research and educational programs.            IPCE blog             Contact us                    About            Our team             Sign up for our newsletter           Our Core Areas           Research  Supporting and conducting research on vital public issues.             Democratic Education  Our programming is focused on building civic engagement capacity, education, and leadership.             Engagement  Providing tools for dynamic, engaged communities.             Urban Public Policy Fellowship  Learn more about our undergraduate fellowship.            Recent Research Reports and Publications        Knight Foundation National Report  The Institute produced a report for the Knight Foundation analyzing the results of a nationwide On The Table initiative.          On the Table Impact Reports  IPCE's report on the findings of the Chicago Community Trust's yearly On The Table initiative.          Consent Decree Public Engagement Report  In partnership with the Illinois Attorney General, IPCE produced an engagement report on the police consent decree.
